price: 13. Waarin hij noch zal sterven (om rust te vinden) noch zal leven (een goed leven zal leiden).
arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: thumma lā yamūtu fīhā walā yaḥyā
